 OOC: Hey Blacknightmare is currently in Infectron's base but, regarding that Legendary Nemesis and neither Dcburn are posting I'll consider to appear her in IGL. What about NAjah??? He was in IGl.
Khonkolor/Nightstrike:::
Khonkolor said "One to all and all to one... like the three musketeers just now we're the three MAximals...".  Nightstrike walked towards the arena and he opened fire against... EPYON!!!
 
 
  RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote: ::Hot Rod/Epyon::

Hot Rod runs out, into the battle area. Epyon slowly walks behind him.
Hot Rod turns to Epyon and Khonkolor.
"Lets work together guys. I dont have a problem fighting in the end, if
we get rid of the rest of these guys."
"I agree, lets work together," says Epyon.
"What about you, Khonkolor?" Asks Hot Rod.
